name: market for motor scooter, 50 cubic cm engine | motor scooter, 50 cubic cm engine | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/5925/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'motor scooter, 50 cubic cm engine', in the Global geography.;Transport from producers to consumers of this product in the geography covered by the market is included.;This product is a mobile infrastructure that is used in the service of transportation. The vehicle operates with petrol, it runs with 60-70km/h at max. speed and its operation emissions represents average values for Swiss 50cc-150cc fleet. Its occupation is to carry 1.1 person and it has a lifetime expectancy of 50,000km.  

This activity starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'motor scooter, 50 cubic cm engine',  within the geography of Global.

This activity ends with the supply of 'motor scooter, 50 cubic cm engine',  to the consumers of this product. Transport is included. Product losses during transportation are assumed negligible and are therefore not included.
